name: The Migratory Trail
description:
High Concept: A new take on the RTS classic "The Oregon Trail" featuring migrating geese!

Description: Navigate your flock North as you seek food and safety, all the while dealing with an inhospitable world that constantly seeks your downfall. 

Gameplay Features: 

  • Real-time
  • Hilarious Events
  • Intuitive Design 
  • Point & Click 
  • Geese!

Controls:

  • Left Mouse-Click

Developers:

Project Lead:

  • Cooper Hall

Sound Designer & Troubleshooter:

  • Trent Wood

Programmers:

  • Forrest McCarthy
  • Nathan KneBusch

Artists:

  • Jaycee Isenhart
  • Nathan Reed
  • Kate Kruse 

Recommended System:

CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3820 CPU @ 3.60GHz

RAM: 16GB 

Operating System: Windows 7-10

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD equivalent

Input Devices:

  • Mouse & Keyboard
